Royalty, fighting on the front lines? A
ruler must risk everything, it seems.
In Zofia, we forgot that long ago...

I fight as part of the Deliverance. We
will take back Zofia from Desaix's
unjust rule—no matter what.

I see your consideration for your
comrades. You are kind and diligent
in your duties. May I rely on you, too?

I'd love to learn more about this world.
Your perspective would be of
particular value—if you have the time.

I was just taking care of my horse.
With no attendants here, the task falls
to me. It's a lot of work, but I enjoy it.

Ah, $Nu, is it?$k$pI bring with me the faith and respect
of $Nf.

This power propels us to the
realization of our ideals!

I must continue to devote myself
to training...

You have my apologies. I have
failed to meet your expectations.

I shall take this power and deliver
victory to you!

I am Clive. I believe that we of noble
birth have a duty to use our strength
to bring peace to the land.

It's strange. As soon as I see you, I
feel the tension that has built up
within me crumble into nothing.$k$pAs a knight commander, I always
strive to embody the qualities of a
leader. It is my station.$k$pBetween us, however...I'll admit that I
have sometimes thought about
casting all of it away.$k$pI have never spoken to anyone about
this, you must understand.$k$pYou...are someone I can confide in.
I feel I can tell you just about
anything. Why is this?$k$pPerhaps it is because we hail from
different worlds, and different walks
of life...$k$pThough that may be true...that is not
the whole truth.$k$pIt's your charisma. You charm us all...
And we follow you, both on and off
the battlefield. That's how I see it.
